tab1.text1:
Welcome to Noobs Rising 
 I'm Turok and hope you enjoy your stay here, 
 as you can see various buttons will help ou in your way here

tab2.text1:
rates for the server are as follows,
 x3xp,
 x4loot,
 x5fishing loot,
 x75 baby mature,
 75egghatch,
 x5 crop growth,
 x5 harvest,
 x5 taming
tab2.text2: NR is a long standing community that caters for newer players and casual players that want to escape the vanilla feel and grind. some previous admin mods are Link, Solo,Turok

tab3.text1:

tab3.text2: PAT, JULIE, LYOKO, VIBRO, STRIDER, TUROK

tab4.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Basilisk (Passive): Carcha,Giga and Quetz (fertilized) Eggs,
 Candy/Ice/Rock Golem (Knockout): Extraordinary Kibble,
 StoneMagmasaur (Knockout): Raw MeatCrystal Wyvern (Passive): Shadow Steak,Crystal.
 Featherlight (Passive): Sweet Veggie Cake,Rare Flower.
 Shinehorn (Passive): Sweet Veggie Cake,Battle Tartare.
Glowtail (Passive): Sweet Veggie Cake,Rare Mushroom.
 Bulbdog (Passive): Rare Mushroom ,Rare Flower.
 Mantis (Passive): Exceptional Kibble,
 Rhino Horn,Spoiled Meat,
 Tek Dinos (Knockout): Extraordinary Kibble</>
tab4.text2: <TextStyle.Violet>Useful creators with guides, Nooblets, theaxeman, syntax, raasclark, naked zombo</>
tab4.text3:
<TextStyle.Red>No pillar spamming, No blocking of resource nodes or dino spawns,
 No toxicity,No griefing of any kind,
 pester admin because you lost a dino or kit, full list in discord</>
tab4.text4:
<TextStyle.White>Build a decent sized base perimiter using dino gates,
  seek help when needed,
 trade and run content with others, socialise, join discord </>
